Sensing
Perception
INtelligence (SPIN) Lab

We are a dynamic research group exploring sensory interactions to understand how humans perceive the world and build intelligence. In this quest, we resort to analyzing various kinds of digitized sensory signals (and data). We think this exploration is critical for building futuristic intelligent human-machine interaction. Our game is to grow and share our understanding, and help create this future.

Previous Next

From a broader perspective, sensory interactions have been around for more than a billion years and have profoundly affected the forms, habits, destinies and evolution of the creatures. To this end, in our work, we conceptualize novel approaches to create (or use existing) datasets, develop algorithms and computational analysis pipelines, and engineer intelligent use cases. Know more about our explorations at Research.

We are placed in the Mehta Family School of Data Science and AI, Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati. We exchange ideas and work with our neighbors from Dept. EEE and Center for Linguistic Science and Technology, as well as with the colleagues from LEAP Lab, Indian Instititute of Science, Bangalore and International Audio Labs, Erlangen, Germany.

Our campus is calmy vibrant :), bio-diverse and fondly popular in India as (most!) heavenly. We are situated in the North-East India (see Pictures).

We are looking for passionate students (across undergarduate, Masters, and PhD), and Postdocs to join the team (more info) !
